product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Women's
long_description: Stay comfortable during any activity in very cold weather with the women's Patagonia Capilene(R) 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms, a warm and highly breathable next-to-skin layer. Side seams are positioned a bit forward to create chafe-free comfort. The smooth exterior of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) polyester slides easily under layers, and its brushed interior feels soft against skin, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric treatment helps deter odors. Plush, brushed waistband offers next-to-skin softness; medium rise hits just below the natural waist. The women's Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms feature a contoured, slim fit that won't restrict your movement.
short_description: Stay comfortable during any activity in very cold weather with the women's Patagonia Capilene(R) 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms, a warm and highly breathable next-to-skin layer.
